item.title: About
item.description: Hi! ðŸ‘‹ I’m John Orcutt, a systems/software engineer building platforms for weather and climate modeling. I’m located in the Longmont, Colorado which is situated in the Front Range region of the state. I’ll use my blog to share my thoughts on things I find interesting and am passionate about. You can also follow me on Mastodon. I intentionally am not going to allow comments here, but you can always reply or comment about my posts over on Mastodon.

item.title: Colophon
item.description: Yeah, I’ve shamelessly stolen this from John Gruber’s wonderful Daring Fireball. I love the idea of having a place to share the technologies and tools you’re using and couldn’t resist. Posts are written in Markdown using BBEdit. The site is powered by Hugo and I’m using the Paper theme. The site is deployed on GitHub Pages. More to come as I think of it…
